title: january 23: no more CFCs
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Sweden pioneering an environmental ban that later swept the world. Then, she talks about a pop star getting arrested for a car race. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
